ref.mixed-citation: See also Puente-Ballesteros B. “Antoine Thomas, SI as a ‘Patient’ of the Kangxi Emperor (R. 1662–1722): A Case Study on the Appropriation of Theriac at the Imperial Court”, Asclepio: Revista de Historia de la Medicina y de la Ciencia. 2012;64.1:213-250, doi: 10.3989/asclepio.2012.v64.i1.519.
